name: One Man's Trash (ShadowBand) (ShadowBand)
description:
Shipwrecked at sea,  washed up on a giant garbage clump, struggling to survive... hunted by something hostile ...something inhuman...

NOTE: MOUSE + KEYBOARD Version currently supported!

- Search the garbage around you for useful items you can use to craft new objects
- Day/Night cycle creates a tense atmosphere as you quickly act to gather what you need to survive the night
- Figure out how to outmatch an unseen, unknown predator living amongst the trash
- Balance eating what you find with the dangerous toxicity consuming it inflicts
- Start BONFIRES in order to stay safe at night and also catch the attention of a passing ship to be rescued!
